languages.text: "А мы смотрели. Ну а под конец вечеринки капитана кинули на горку тел его команды и по дензовскому обычаю подожгли. Живого. Хорошие были времена... жаль, Денз завязал. Мне вот кажется, не займись он этой, чтоб ее, "мирной жизнью" — не сыграл бы в ящик, еще б лет двадцать протянул".

"We three watched. And when the party drew to a close, we threw the captain on top of the pile of his crew's bodies and, as was Denz's way, torched him. Alive. Those were good times... It's a real shame Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this — whatchucallit — 'peaceful life,' maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."
languages.original_text: "А мы смотрели. Ну а под конец вечеринки капитана кинули на горку тел его команды и по дензовскому обычаю подожгли. Живого. Хорошие были времена... жаль, Денз завязал. Мне вот кажется, не займись он этой, чтоб ее, "мирной жизнью" — не сыграл бы в ящик, еще б лет двадцать протянул".

Those were good times... it's a real shame that Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this, whatchucallit, 'peaceful life' — maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

Those were good times... it's a real shame that Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this, whatchucallit, 'peaceful life' — maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

It's a real shame Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this — whatchucallit — 'peaceful life,' maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

It's a real shame Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this — whatchucallit — 'peaceful life,' maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

"We three watched. And when the party drew to a close, we threw the captain on top of the pile of his crew's bodies and, as was Denz's way, torched him. Alive. Those were good times... It's a real shame Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this — whatchucallit — 'peaceful life,' maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

languages.text: “我们三个人就那么看着。派对快要结束的时候，我们把舰长扔在船员的尸堆上，按丹兹的要求把他给烧了，活活烧死了。那段日子是多么美好啊……如今丹兹不在了，真是太可惜了。那个词怎么说来着？噢，对，‘和平的生活’。我一直在想，如果他没有迷恋上这样的谎言，或许他就不会死，或许他还能再活上二十年。”
languages.original_text: "We three watched. And when the party drew to a close, we threw the captain on top of the pile of his crew's bodies and, as was Denz's way, torched him. Alive. Those were good times... It's a real shame Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this — whatchucallit — 'peaceful life,' maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

traits.locale_text: “我们三个人就那么看着。派对快要结束的时候，我们把舰长扔在船员的尸堆上，按丹兹的要求把他给烧了，活活烧死了。那段日子是多么美好啊……如今丹兹不在了，真是太可惜了。那个词怎么说来着？噢，对，‘和平的生活’。我一直在想，如果他没有迷恋上这样的谎言，或许他就不会死，或许他还能再活上二十年。”

languages.text: «Los tres miramos todo el proceso. Al terminar la fiesta, lanzamos al capitán sobre el montón de cadáveres de su tripulación y, como era costumbre de Denz, lo quemamos. Vivo, claro. Tiempos aquellos... es una pena que Denz lo dejara. Sigo pensando que si se hubiera dejado de monsergas de "vida apacible" seguiría entre nosotros. Seguro que todavía le quedarían otros veinte años de vida».
languages.original_text: "We three watched. And when the party drew to a close, we threw the captain on top of the pile of his crew's bodies and, as was Denz's way, torched him. Alive. Those were good times... It's a real shame Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this — whatchucallit — 'peaceful life,' maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

traits.locale_text: «Los tres miramos todo el proceso. Al terminar la fiesta, lanzamos al capitán sobre el montón de cadáveres de su tripulación y, como era costumbre de Denz, lo quemamos. Vivo, claro. Tiempos aquellos... es una pena que Denz lo dejara. Sigo pensando que si se hubiera dejado de monsergas de "vida apacible" seguiría entre nosotros. Seguro que todavía le quedarían otros veinte años de vida».

languages.text: 「俺たち3人は見てただけ。そしてパーティーが終わりに近づくと、船長を乗組員の死体の山の上に放り投げて、デンツらしくまとめて放火した。生きたままね。いい時代だったな…デンツが船から降りたのは本当に残念だった。『平和な生活』にバカみてえに憧れなければ死んでなかったかもしれない。それどころか、あと20年は生きてたかもな」
languages.original_text: "We three watched. And when the party drew to a close, we threw the captain on top of the pile of his crew's bodies and, as was Denz's way, torched him. Alive. Those were good times... It's a real shame Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this — whatchucallit — 'peaceful life,' maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たち3人は見てただけ。そしてパーティーが終わりに近づくと、船長を乗組員の死体の山の上に放り投げて、デンツらしくまとめて放火した。生きたままね。いい時代だったな…デンツが船から降りたのは本当に残念だった。『平和な生活』にバカみてえに憧れなければ死んでなかったかもしれない。それどころか、あと20年は生きてたかもな」

languages.text: "Wir drei haben zugesehen. Und als die Party fast zu Ende war, warfen wir den Captain auf den Leichenhaufen seiner Crew und zündeten ihn an, wie es Denz' Art war. Lebendig. Das waren gute Zeiten damals ... Wirklich schade, dass Denz aufgehört hat. Ich denke immer, wenn er nicht auf dieses – wie heißt das? – 'friedliche Leben' reingefallen wäre, wäre er vielleicht nicht gestorben, sondern hätte noch zwanzig Jahre weitergelebt."
languages.original_text: "We three watched. And when the party drew to a close, we threw the captain on top of the pile of his crew's bodies and, as was Denz's way, torched him. Alive. Those were good times... It's a real shame Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this — whatchucallit — 'peaceful life,' maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

traits.locale_text: "Wir drei haben zugesehen. Und als die Party fast zu Ende war, warfen wir den Captain auf den Leichenhaufen seiner Crew und zündeten ihn an, wie es Denz' Art war. Lebendig. Das waren gute Zeiten damals ... Wirklich schade, dass Denz aufgehört hat. Ich denke immer, wenn er nicht auf dieses – wie heißt das? – 'friedliche Leben' reingefallen wäre, wäre er vielleicht nicht gestorben, sondern hätte noch zwanzig Jahre weitergelebt."

languages.text: « Nous trois, on regardait. Quand la fête a commencé à toucher à sa fin, on a balancé le capitaine sur le tas de cadavres et, comme Denz avait l'habitude de faire, on l'a brûlé. Vivant. C'était le bon vieux temps... C'est vraiment dommage que Denz ait fini par raccrocher. Souvent, je me dis que s'il ne s'était pas laissé amadouer par cette "vie paisible", comme on dit, peut-être qu'il n'aurait pas clamsé. Peut-être qu'il aurait vécu vingt ans de plus. »
languages.original_text: "We three watched. And when the party drew to a close, we threw the captain on top of the pile of his crew's bodies and, as was Denz's way, torched him. Alive. Those were good times... It's a real shame Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this — whatchucallit — 'peaceful life,' maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

traits.locale_text: « Nous trois, on regardait. Quand la fête a commencé à toucher à sa fin, on a balancé le capitaine sur le tas de cadavres et, comme Denz avait l'habitude de faire, on l'a brûlé. Vivant. C'était le bon vieux temps... C'est vraiment dommage que Denz ait fini par raccrocher. Souvent, je me dis que s'il ne s'était pas laissé amadouer par cette "vie paisible", comme on dit, peut-être qu'il n'aurait pas clamsé. Peut-être qu'il aurait vécu vingt ans de plus. »

languages.text: "Üçümüz de izledik. Parti sona yaklaştığında, kaptanı da ölü tayfa yığınının üstüne attık ve Denz'in usulü olduğu üzere yaktık. Diri diri. Ah be, ne güzel zamanlardı... Denz'in bu işlerden elini eteğini çekmesi kötü oldu yahu. Düşünüyorum da şu 'huzurlu yaşam' zırvasına kanmamış olsa belki mortoyu çekmezdi. Bir yirmi yılı daha devirirdi namussuz."
languages.original_text: "We three watched. And when the party drew to a close, we threw the captain on top of the pile of his crew's bodies and, as was Denz's way, torched him. Alive. Those were good times... It's a real shame Denz quit. I keep thinking, if he hadn't fallen for this — whatchucallit — 'peaceful life,' maybe he wouldn't have checked out, maybe he would've lived for another twenty years."

traits.locale_text: "Biz üçümüz izledik. Parti sona erdiğinde kaptanı da mürettebatının ceset yığınına fırlattık ve Denz'in yöntemini uygulayarak yaktık. Canlı canlı. Ne güzel zamanlardı... Denz'in bu işleri bırakması kötü oldu. Düşünüyorum da şu 'huzurlu yaşam' zırvasına kanmamış olsaydı belki ölmezdi. Belki o zaman yirmi yıl daha yaşardı."
